titleStmt.title: A curious collection of paintings will be sold by auction at the Duke of Glocesters Coffee-House at Charing-Cross, on Friday the 22d. of May The conditions of sale as usuall, the lots so bought to be fetcht away within 3 days, paying the porteridge if they desire to have their good received home.

A curious collection of paintings will be sold by auction at the Duke of Glocesters Coffee-House at Charing-Cross, on Friday the 22d. of May The conditions of sale as usuall, the lots so bought to be fetcht away within 3 days, paying the porteridge if they desire to have their good received home.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
